name: Improvised Mashup Sequel
description:
Bugs should be all sorted. Only 'problem' I'm aware of (Unless this is just how it's supposed to work) is that Browsers will keep save files despite any game file changes from my end, which I'm not used to. I'm used to the save file disappearing.
There are save flags in the black screen portal scenes and Meanwhile scene. They should work fine.

These characters and events here do not affect the canons of their original games/other games they are in outside of this Mashup Set/Series.

Controls -

Movement - WASD/ Arrow keys

A = Enter

B = Shift

Start = c (Start on Title Screen, nothing mapped to it in-game)

Select = v (Nothing this time.)

--------------------

Basically -

Again, just like last time - This is a mashup of various backgrounds and characters (Most original, some direct from RPGTsukuru or Animorphs) that I (for original stuff) have made/altered over the two years I've been learning to make games. At least two time periods from medieval to present/futuristic, so maybe 3.

The storyline came from collecting a bunch of event points and throwing them into a randomiser then improvising a coherent story out of them, and winging the dialogue as I made the game according to the plot events.

I thank my friend Kingslayer for wanting a multiverse for inspiring this XD

I also thank one of my best friends Krypt for helping me make some fresh backgrounds I was using for another game as is,
And
My mod for letting me use his character.

----------

Look at the first game for basically the same explanation XD

I came up with most of the ideas this time around, still looking at various books/DVDs/games around me) and dumped them into a randomiser. I did the same with ideas I got from other peeps.

I've also again 'cheated' in the ways of updating my pre-existing backgrounds to ones that better fit the tile (8x8-pixel) limits and making connecting rooms to pre-exists, and using basic characters from RPG Tsukuru/Animorphs.

This game was originally inspired by my friend Kingslayer saying I needed to do something with a multiverse so HERE YA GO! A SEQUEL!!

--------------------

--------------------

Games/Franchises I've made these backgrounds/characters for - (Not just recoloured existing already, made with other assets from scratch)

Detroit Become Human (Mostly the fanseries by Octopunk I'm working on an adaption of, or my own fangame - So areas and character has been used.) (c) Quantic Dreams

Animorphs Canon/fanfic (c) K A Applegate / Scholastic

Zoids (Two OCs for this, one has been made flesh in this project) (c) TOMY

Johnny Castaway screensavers inspired my Desert Island.

-----

The Flood (c) Me

Game I made for my parents' birthday (c) Me

Tavern Boy / Potion Master /  3rd WIP game in series (c) Me

WIP Project with apartment used in live Stream Starting opening (c) Me

Zoid OCs (c) Me

Escape Room (c) Me (NOT the mythical creatures XD Just how I implemented them. And the cute chimera pic (c) Kryptid.

Zikran (c) Me - Taken from a story I started and kind of abandoned, but the creature stayed with me. (Base sprite is GB Alien game sprite altered with help from Kryptid.)

--------------------

--------------------

Games/Franchises I've taken these plot events from -

ATLA - "There is no __ in ___" (c) Nickelodeon Animation Studios

Dead unicorn mystery - Harry Potter (c) Warner Bros

--------------------

Assets -

Harvest Moon (Building exteriors, crops)

VECTORPIXELSTAR (Various Tiles)

Pokemon (Character sprite bases, doors, houses, blocking rocks)

RPG Tsukuru GB (RPG Maker GB) (Castle interiors, barrels, dungeon desks, village/park/town tiles and Character Sprites recoloured, map tiles)

GBS Creator Chris Maltby (Cliff sides, ladder)

GBtilesheet4colours by rhys (Chair in Luiza's, desk altered)

HP1/2 (Simplified then altered chairs/sofa)

Final Fantasy Adventure (NPC Sprite changed to Harpy)

Final Fantasy Legend 2 (Baby Dragon) ??

VECTORPIXELSTAR (Various Tiles)

Animorphs (Animal sprites)

Breath of Fire II (Mountain background from fishing minigame, toilets)

Harvest Moon/2/3 (Building sides and roofs, tree)

Baby bird - Whisper Of The Heart (c) Ghibli.

Watership Down snippet (c) Richard Adams

Ayakashi No Shiro for map for the Minotaur maze and big map bases (c) SETA Corporation
